mapper.select: SELECT basketNo, product.userId, basket.aptCode, product.price, d.sidoName, d.gugunName, d.dongName, h.roadName FROM happyhouse.basket as basket left outer join product as product on basket.aptCode = product.aptCode left outer join houseinfo h on basket.aptCode = h.aptCode left outer join dongcode d on d.dongCode = h.dongCode WHERE basket.userId = #{userId}
